bugs.error_description: Omission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): missing userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity); method locates entity but fails to remove it from persistence layer → error in stored info state (entity persists post-delete), propagates to content failure (undeletable users)

Omission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): missing addressRepository.save(addressEntity); method constructs entity and returns response with null ID but skips persistence → error in stored info state (address not saved), propagates to content failure (missing addresses)

Commission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): unsafe native SQL concatenation '" + username + "'" enables SQL injection → activates on malicious username input, error in computation state (arbitrary DB access), high risk propagation to integrity/halt failure

Omission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): unchecked Optional.get() on findByUsername() → runtime NoSuchElementException if user absent, deviates from auth flow; exposes username existence via exception vs Unauthorized → timing/info disclosure error

Commission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): userRepository.findAll() (List) instead of findAll(pageable) → ignores Pageable, loads entire dataset into memory per request, incorrect PageImpl → performance degradation error, potential OOM failure

Omission fault (human-made, development phase, nonmalicious, software type): unchecked addressRepository.findById(addressId).get() → NoSuchElementException if absent, inconsistent with orElseThrow pattern elsewhere → unhandled runtime error
